title: Polish header spacing and refine landing page to a clean, minimal, premium Apple-style look

requirements.text: Update the global header layout to feel slightly more compact and balanced (not cramped), with the VAANI logo aligned on the left and the login button/user controls aligned on the top-right with consistent breathing room across breakpoints.

quotes:
Header:
• Make the header slightly more compact and balanced, not cramped.
• VAANI logo on the left, login button on the top-right, with clean spacing and breathing room.

Proceed with the header spacing and landing page polish as discussed.
Please implement the clean, minimal, premium Apple-style look.

acceptanceCriteria: On all common viewport widths (mobile, tablet, desktop), the header height/padding is slightly reduced compared to current, while maintaining comfortable spacing between logo and right-side controls.
Logo remains left-aligned, clickable, and navigates to `/`.
When unauthenticated, the "Log in" button stays visually anchored to the top-right area of the header; when authenticated, the user menu control stays in the same position.
Header maintains a light, modern look (subtle border/backdrop blur is acceptable) with no crowded elements or misalignment.

requirements.text: Refine the Home (landing) page styling to a clean, minimal, premium Apple-style look using whitespace and typography (no heavy colors/clutter), while keeping the existing page structure and content.

quotes:
Landing page:
• Minimal and elegant — no heavy colors or clutter.
• Focus on clarity, whitespace, and typography.
• Keep the current structure but refine alignment, spacing, and hierarchy.
Sections:
• No new sections for now.
• Just polish the existing layout to feel like a professional studio product, not a prototype.
Proceed with the header spacing and landing page polish as discussed.

acceptanceCriteria: Home page keeps the same components/sections (welcome heading + Creator Zone card) without adding new sections.
Visual hierarchy is improved: heading/subheading spacing, font sizes/weights, and max-width feel intentional and premium.
Colors are restrained (primarily neutrals); any accent color usage is subtle and does not dominate the page.
Alignment and spacing are consistent (container padding, vertical rhythm, and card placement look polished).

requirements.text: Polish the Creator Zone card presentation to match the premium minimal direction (spacing, typography, and visual density) without changing the submission functionality or adding new features.

quotes: Just polish the existing layout to feel like a professional studio product, not a prototype.

acceptanceCriteria: Creator Zone card header/content spacing is balanced and consistent with the refined landing page style.
Form controls retain current behavior (validation/toasts/submission) with no regressions.
No new fields, flows, or sections are introduced.

requirements.text: Deploy the updated frontend build for review and update the deployment verification checklist to include checks relevant to the header spacing and landing page polish.

quotes: Let me know once the update is deployed for review.

acceptanceCriteria: A new deployed build is produced after UI changes.
Deployment verification documentation includes at least a brief checklist confirming header spacing/alignment and Home page spacing/typography changes are visible in the live build.

constraints: Do not add new landing page sections; only refine alignment, spacing, and hierarchy of the existing structure.

Do not modify files under frontend immutable paths (e.g., `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x)`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`, `frontend/src/components/ui`). Compose existing UI components instead.
No backend changes are required for this request; avoid altering Motoko state/schema.
nonGoals: Changing session timeout duration or auto-logout behavior.
Adding new landing page sections (features, mission, showcases) or new product flows.
Changing authentication providers or adding third-party auth.

preferencesToAdd: Clean, minimal, premium Apple-style visual design with strong whitespace/typography and restrained color usage
